Mobster watched, wondering how Razorclaw felt...and enjoying the thought. M=
obster, as cruel as the Mini-Mafia could be, waited for Razorclaw to regain=
 his strength and composure, he wanted to knock it out of Razorclaw again..=
.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
  Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 3:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulsti=
ce


  Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the impact made his head spin. The m=
ighty raptor heard Mobster have some smart ass comment toward him. He looke=
d up in time to see Mobster raise his weapon again. Razor Claw turned and t=
ried to run and got just far enough to avoid being hit directly by the beam=
. The weapon still had a devastating effect on him though as the shrapnel o=
f dirt and pebbles shred at his skin. The blast shot him about sixty yards =
from where he'd started. He landed with an ooof as his body skipped multipl=
e times across the hard African ground. There he lay in pain, trying to reg=
ain his strength and composure.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From:=
 SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000=
 1:53 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Mobster wobbled some, but t=
hat was the extent of it. He turned around.

    Mobster (Grenade voice): A=
re you trying to knock me over, little man?

    Mobster fires at Razorclaw=
 once...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
     =
 Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as=
 Mobsters foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. Hi=
s energy was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran t=
oward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impac=
t shook the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He ro=
lled to his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobs=
ters rear end hoping the giant would still be off balance enough to knock o=
ver.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: SOULSTICE 
       =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
 =
       Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        (I normally am against stompi=
ng, but...)
         
        Mobster raised his foot.

        Mobster (Kr=
acken voice): Over!

        Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw.=
..
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
    =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:=
11 PM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Razor Claw remaine=
d still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. He opened a comm =
to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned down =
and need some coverfire."
            ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
     From: SOULSTICE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent:=
 Saturday, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulsti=
ce


            Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to move sometim=
e.

            Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Wh=
o helped to build this house?

            Mobster kept his cannon aimed at=
 Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
              ----- Original Message --=
--- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
              Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
              Subj=
ect: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Razor Claw knew that there was onl=
y one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that size. he transformed to =
Raptor mode and used full strength on his shield. The ground around him inc=
inerated on contact. He survived but it was sapping to much of his strength=
. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating his shield.
               =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: SOULSTICE 
           =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, December 22, 200=
0 10:04 AM
                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                M=
obster took a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster a=
imed his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
                  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
                  From: CYBERWOLF4 
                  =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7=
:01 AM
                  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  R=
azor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He s=
tepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impres=
s me?" he asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
                    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
                    From: SOULSTICE 
         =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Thursday, Dece=
mber 21, 2000 10:50 AM
                    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


 =
                   Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in =
his place now.

                    Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as =
Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

                    Mob=
ster switches voices.

                    Kracken: But right now, we're Mo=
bster...
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
                   Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
             =
         Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                      Razor Claw lo=
oked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challeng=
e, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I =
knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, p=
ulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go =
first."
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
           From: SOULSTICE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                        Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
      =
                  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Gi=
gas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but =
I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidate=
d. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but =
i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the A=
lliance, it would do you a world of good.

                        Gigas st=
ayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
                          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
                          From: CYBERWOLF4 
  =
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          S=
ent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                          Subjec=
t: Sorry soulstice


                          Sorry, it must've been mixxe=
d up in the battle. I found it.

                          claw struck him,=
 but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the =
energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he again=
 came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging b=
y the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultr=
a sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

   =
                       Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  Th=
e punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused=
 the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He=
 looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that =
wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight=
".
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
              From: THECODE 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
                            Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
=
                            Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, ma=
ybe the three should get help.


                            OOC: Hey, Giga=
s punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
                              ----- =
Original Message ----- 
                              From: CYBERWOLF4 
   =
                           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        =
      Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                           =
   Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help=
.


                              Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the=
 sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he men=
tally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three=
 until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode,=
 pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced=
 to, your choice."

                              He aproached the three bo=
ts ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
     =
                           ----- Original Message ----- 
                  =
              From: dachande 
                                To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
                                Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 =
7:40 PM
                                Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and =
Ramus


                                ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
     =
                            
                                    They had h=
eard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the confl=
ict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togth=
er they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.













=










          eGroups Sponsor
